title: How to Play SimCity for iPhone or iTouch

steps.headline: Get the game started and starting naming the city, how much money you have, etc.
Once you have finished that, you will start with an open land.
steps.description: You will need to zone for commercial, residential, and industrial. Industry makes lots of pollution, so don't put it near the city.

steps.headline: There are three types of each zone: low, medium, and high density.
steps.description: The low density cost less. You will need to start small.

steps.headline: Start off by doing the tutorial to get the hang of the game and how to do things.
steps.description: After that start building. Remember that you need to have everything connected to power and water.

steps.headline: Once you start zoning residential, be sure to put electricity and water near it so that people can move in.
Once people start moving in, they will demand industry and commercial.
steps.description: Zone for these. Remember to put commercial and industry away from the residential area. The people won't like them near their houses.

steps.headline: Soon the people will need security and fire protection.
steps.description: Be sure to get the police and fire stations out.

steps.headline: You will need to raise taxes to about 8% for residential.
steps.description: Don't go over, or people will leave your city.

steps.headline: Check your ordinances.
steps.description: Be sure to enable legalized gambling and parking fines. Those will get you money.

steps.headline: Keep adding to the zones to have more and more people move in.
steps.description: Just be sure that all zones are connected.

text: Get the game started and starting naming the city, how much money you have, etc.  Once you have finished that, you will start with an open land. You will need to zone for commercial, residential, and industrial. Industry makes lots of pollution, so don't put it near the city. There are three types of each zone: low, medium, and high density. The low density cost less. You will need to start small. Start off by doing the tutorial to get the hang of the game and how to do things. After that start building. Remember that you need to have everything connected to power and water. Once you start zoning residential, be sure to put electricity and water near it so that people can move in.  Once people start moving in, they will demand industry and commercial. Zone for these. Remember to put commercial and industry away from the residential area. The people won't like them near their houses. Soon the people will need security and fire protection. Be sure to get the police and fire stations out. You will need to raise taxes to about 8% for residential. Don't go over, or people will leave your city. Check your ordinances. Be sure to enable legalized gambling and parking fines. Those will get you money. Keep adding to the zones to have more and more people move in. Just be sure that all zones are connected. Have fun!
